import React from 'react' import Cover from '../../img/cover.jpg' import Profile from '../../img/profileImg.jpeg' import './ProfileCard.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const ProfileCard = () => { const {user} = useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const ProfilePage =false; return (
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.worksAt? user.worksAt: "Escribe sobre ti"}
{user.followings.length} Followings
{user.followers.length} Followers
{ProfilePage && ( <>
3 Posts
)}
{ProfilePage ? '' : Mi perfil}
) } export default ProfileCard
